mapper.select: select dept_id deptId,dept_name deptName,dept_code deptCode, store_id storeId from dept_info where store_id = #{storeId} and is_results = 1 and is_deleted = 0

select combo_id comboId, combo_name comboName, store_id storeId, combo_image comboImage, combo_sale_price comboSalePrice, sales_count salesCount from combo_info where dept_id = #{deptId} and is_deleted = 0
select a.project_id as projectId, a.project_name as projectName, a.project_count as projectCount from combo_project a where a.combo_id = #{comboId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ifnull(sum(a.remaining_count), 0) as residueTime, ifnull(sum(a.project_count), 0) - ifnull(sum(a.remaining_count), 0) as consumeTatailTime from member_combo_project a where a.combo_id = #{comboId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by a.project_id, a.project_name
SELECT dept_id,dept_name, #{begin} begin,#{end} end from dept_info WHERE store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_results = 1 AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT ci.combo_id comboId, ci.combo_name comboName, di.dept_id deptId, SUM(IFNULL(od.project_count,0)) comboCnt, SUM(IFNULL(od.discount_amount,0)) comboAmount from combo_info ci LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON ci.combo_id = od.project_id RIGHT JOIN dept_info di ON ci.dept_id = di.dept_id WHERE di.dept_id = #{deptId} AND ci.combo_id IS NOT NULL AND (od.create_time >= #{begin} AND od.create_time < #{end} OR od.create_time IS NULL) AND od.is_deleted = 0 AND od.order_type = 3 GROUP BY ci.combo_id

SELECT ci.combo_id comboId, ci.combo_name comboName, di.dept_id deptId, SUM(IFNULL(od.project_count,0)) comboCnt, SUM(IFNULL(od.real_price,0)) comboAmount, SUM( IFNULL(od.discount_amount, 0) ) / SUM(IFNULL(od.project_count, 100)) avgPrice from combo_info ci LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON ci.combo_id = od.project_id RIGHT JOIN dept_info di ON ci.dept_id = di.dept_id WHERE di.store_id = #{storeId} AND (od.create_time >= #{begin} AND od.create_time < #{end} OR od.create_time IS NULL) AND od.is_deleted = 0 AND od.order_type = 3 AND ci.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY ci.combo_id
ORDER BY comboAmount DESC
ORDER BY comboAmount ASC
ORDER BY comboCnt DESC
ORDER BY comboCnt ASC
ORDER BY avgPrice DESC
ORDER BY avgPrice ASC
SELECT dept_id,#{dateType} dateType,#{begin} begin,#{end} end from dept_info WHERE store_id =#{storeId} AND is_results = 1 AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(discount_amount,0)) deptSum
,SUBSTR(create_time,9,2) currDate
,SUBSTR(create_time,6,2) currDate
from order_detail WHERE dept_id= #{deptId} AND create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{end} AND order_type = 3 AND is_deleted = 0
GROUP BY SUBSTR(create_time,1,10)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(create_time,1,7)

SELECT ci.combo_id comboId, ci.combo_name comboName, di.dept_id deptId, SUM(IFNULL(od.project_count,0)) comboCnt, SUM(IFNULL(od.real_price,0)) comboAmount, SUM( IFNULL(od.discount_amount, 0) ) / SUM(IFNULL(od.project_count, 100)) avgPrice from combo_info ci LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON ci.combo_id = od.project_id RIGHT JOIN dept_info di ON ci.dept_id = di.dept_id WHERE di.dept_id = #{deptId} AND (od.create_time >= #{begin} AND od.create_time < #{end} OR od.create_time IS NULL) AND od.is_deleted = 0 AND od.order_type = 3 GROUP BY ci.combo_id ORDER BY comboAmount DESC

select count(*) as countTime from combo_info a where exists(select 1 from member_combo_project c where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.combo_id = a.combo_id) and a.is_count_limit = 0 and a.is_deleted = 0

SELECT SUM(IF(order_type=3,1,0)) cashComboCnt, SUM(if(order_type=3,real_price,0)) cashComboAmt from order_detail WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from order_info WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{end} AND is_deleted = 0 AND store_id = #{storeId} AND cash_amount + unionpay_amount + wechat_amount + alipay_amount + group_amount + debt_amount > 0 ) AND order_id IN ( SELECT order_id from order_info WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{end} AND is_deleted = 0 AND store_id = #{storeId} AND cash_amount + unionpay_amount + wechat_amount + alipay_amount + group_amount + debt_amount > 0 )
AND project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT SUM(IF(order_type=3,1,0)) cardComboCnt, SUM(if(order_type=3,real_price,0)) cardComboAmt from order_detail WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from order_info WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{end} AND is_deleted = 0 AND card_amount>0 AND store_id = #{storeId} ) AND order_id IN ( SELECT order_id from order_info WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{end} AND is_deleted = 0 AND card_amount>0 AND store_id = #{storeId} )
AND project_id = #{projectId}
